column5: Close to everything in San Antonio--drive or Uber!  2 day minimum stay.  Great 1000 square feet apartment in a Deco era home, comfortable queen size bed, nice furnishings, washer & dryer, wifi, full kitchen with deck and access to a large fenced yard with garden, grill, and pizza oven.  One time pet fee of $50.cash per pet  upon arrival.    We do NOT charge a cleaning fee so guests are requested to leave the apartment in good condition. (We will take care of linens!)
